titleInfo.title: Bill Monroe and the Blue Grass Boys at Florida State Hospital Auditorium (19485)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Bill Monroe and the Blue Grass Boys with Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys at Florida State Hospital Auditorium on January 19. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Monroe and Jim and Jesse. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/47884/

subject.topic: Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys (Musical group)
